oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: When the lion is coming, he is preceded by an apparition which resembles a real lion. By /han=kasso (L. VIII.-6. 6576 rev.). 1) This story is found in Book VIII-6.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The coming of lion
